title: How to Change Home Address on iPhone

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. This app has a white phone icon on a green background. If you would prefer, you can instead start this method by opening your Contacts app. This app has a person icon on the cover of a contact book.

steps.title: Tap Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Contacts . This option is in the bottom middle of the screen.

steps.title: Tap My Card.
steps.content: Tap My Card . If you have entered your contact information before, this option will be at the top of your screen. [1] X Research source Otherwise, tap the plus icon, then create your contact card .

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . After tapping this option in the top right, you will be able edit your contact information.

steps.title: Edit your home address.
steps.content: Edit your home address. If you already have a home address specified, you can tap each field to make the necessary changes. To add a new address, tap the + and type the address details. Be sure to label your address as “home” by tapping the blue word next to the red “-” icon, then choosing home . To remove an address, tap the red minus sign - next to the address and then tap delete .

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . After tapping this option at the top right, your new address will save and automatically update in Apple Maps. To find your address in Apple Maps, simply search for Home , then tap the result with the house icon. Allow a few minutes for Apple Maps to process your updated address. If it is still not showing up, try closing and reopening the app. This method also changes your default address across other Apple apps that use that information, including Siri.

steps.title: Open the Google Maps app.
steps.content: Open the Google Maps app. This app has a blue, green, yellow, and red location marker icon on a white background.

steps.title: Tap Saved.
steps.content: Tap Saved . You can find this option in the bottom middle of your screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Labeled.
steps.content: Tap Labeled . This option is indicated by a blue flag and is under the “Your lists” category.

steps.title: Tap the three dots next to Home.
steps.content: Tap the three dots next to Home . If you do not have a home address in Google Maps yet, just tap the Home button itself.

steps.title: Choose Edit home.
steps.content: Choose Edit home . This is the second option in the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Type in your new home address and choose it from the dropdown menu.
steps.content: Type in your new home address and choose it from the dropdown menu. After you have deleted your old address and typed in your new information, pick the corresponding option that appears below the search bar. If you do not see your address, tap the Choose on map button and find your house manually. To test if your home address updated successfully, go back to the main page, then search Home .
